lines.text:
[while fighting Goro]
Those were $500 sunglasses, asshole.
Trust me, Sonya!
I only trust one person, Jax, and you're talking to her.

We got a guy with things comin' out of his hands, we got another guy who freezes stuff, and then there's a man, who as far as I can tell, is made out of electricity. I mean, how did he disappear like that? What is goin' on here? WHO IS THIS GUY?
Let's just think this through. There IS a rational explanation for all this.
He's Rayden, god of lightning and protector of the realm of Earth.
Oh yeah. THERE'S your rational explanation!
While you're at it, why don't you call my agent?
Do I look like your secretary?
[Johnny has challenged Goro]
What have you done?
I made a choice. This is OUR tournament, remember? Mortal Kombat. WE fight it!
[Johnny leaves, Rayden smiles]
Good. At last one of them has understood.
I have looked into their souls... and yours. One of you three with determine the outcome of the tournament. The fate of billions depends upon you. Heh, heh, heh!
[resigned]
Sorry.
[last lines]
You weak, pathetic fools, I've come for your souls!
I don't think so.
I'm in a hostile environment. I'm totally unprepared. And I'm surrounded by a bunch of guys who probably want to kick my ass... it's like being back in high school.
Your soul is mine...
[pause]
Fatality.
Get over here!

[Johnny Cage is about to fight Goro]
Finish him quickly. Pay me my tribute.
This puny mortal will be no problem. I'll crush him with one blow.
All right? Let's dance.

[appears before Cage, Sonya and Liu Kang]
Listen, what you are about to face is for more important than...
[to Cage]
your ego
[to Sonya]
your enemy
[to Liu Kang]
or your quest for revenge. You're about to embark on a secret mission. You have been chosen to defend the realm of Earth. In a tournament called Mortal Kombat.

[Seeing someone sitting in his chair]
Hey, mister. You're in my chair.

[Reading a Tabloid, and lowering it to reveal himself]
Hi, Johnny.
Oh, Master Boyd.
I can see that the press is still giving you a hard time.
Yeah, they think I'm a fake.
Johnny, you are one of the best martial artists in the world, and I can help you prove it.
Prove it? How?
A tournament, "THE" tournament.
[Hands him an invitation]
It's held once a generation. The best fighters in the world are invited. You win the tournament, you win their respect. They'll tell the whole world, that you're the real goods.
So, how do I...
There's a boat, it leaves Hong Kong tomorrow, be on it.
Where the hell are we?
Do I look like your travel agent?
This is where you fall down.
I guess you knew it would end this way.
Didn't have a clue.
You know, you gotta admire her. When she sets her mind on something...
It's not her mind you're admiring.
It's true.
Flawless victory!
You can look into my soul, but you don't own it.
[about Kano]
Why else would I have chosen such a disreputable-looking cretin? Look at him! No dignity, no manners... Yet in the realm of Earth, men like him can amass great wealth, and almost god-like power.
Yeah, and I'd like to get back to my amassing as soon as possible, if you don't mind! Now when do I get paid?
Johnny Cage, I challenge you!
No! You'll fight me. I am Liu Kang, descendent of Kung Lao. I challenge you to Mortal Kombat.
This is not good... but I'm fine... I can handle this... So this is Outworld, huh? Well, I can see why they want a change of scenery!
To win your next match, use the element which brings life.
Give it up, baby. I've studied all your moves.
Yeah? STUDY THIS!
[hits him]
Time to die.

[Takes first look inside the weird temple]
Gee, I wonder what the bathroom looks like.
Kitana went this way... I can smell her purfume.
I don't smell anything.
I smell something
[Looks at Johnny Cage]
Bullshit!

If I did not believe in you Liu Kang, I would not have helped you. In the Black Tower, you will face three challenges. You must face your enemy. You must face yourself. And you must face your worst fear.
[Johnny Cage sees a shadow of Goro loom upon a stone wall]
(whispering) Sonya, you go on ahead... find out WHAT that was... Liu and I will stay here!
From this moment on, my island will be your battle ground.
[points to Liu Kang]
Liu Kang, you will be first. Let Mortal Kombat begin.
Don't worry, I've got a plan.
Oh, I can't believe this! You are the most egotistical, self-deluded person I have ever met!
Yeah, well you forgot good looking.
[Kano is on the ground turning purple, because Sonya's knees are clamped tight around his neck]
No, Sonya, don't! Please! Come on, give me a break!
Okay.
[twists her legs, breaking Kano's neck]
[to Goro]
You imbecile!
Challenging Goro eh? You weren't supposed to fight him now. Are you THAT eager to die?
I'm not the one who's gonna die.
I see. You're very foolish. A true sign of a hero. You want to protect your friends, but make no mistake; they too will die, after Goro destroys you.
So what's the problem?

As you wish. As absurd as your request is I shall grant it. In return, I reserve the right to challenge the winner myself... or another of my choosing. In a place designated by me for the final battle of the tournament.
You got it pal.
Spare him, my lord Rayden. American life has enfeebled his mind. Too much television.
Hey, pal! When the ship comes in, could you put these on board?
You want ME to carry YOUR luggage?
Yeah. I pay money, you carry the bags, or is that too complicated?
No...
[Liu Kang takes money out of Cage's hand]
...I got it.
Good.
[Liu Kang picks up a suitcase and throws it in the water, then smiles at Cage while walking away]
[Cage watches his suitcase sink]
Well, thank God I didn't ask him to park the car...

[after Rayden saves the trio from several ninjas]
You're lucky he stopped us.
[repeated line]
I don't think so.

[At Grandfather]
I had enough of this. I'm going to find my brother's killer at the tournament, with or without your consent.

[At Lord Rayden]
He isn't ready my lord, and we lost so much time.
I know, but there's no one else.
Get down here!
We are here to fight in Mortal Kombat. Tomorrow the great Kombat begins, and now a taste of things to come.
Shang Tsung killed my brother!
You're mine!
You're a coward, Sorcerer! Stand and fight!
We are not alone.
All those souls and you still don't have one of your own. I pity you sorcerer.

[Enraged]
Save your pity for THE WEAK!
IT HAS BEGUN!
I saw this Lui Kang in the hall, I will crush him in one blow.
Where are you taking us?
Kitana went this way...
[sniffs the air]
I can smell her perfume.
I don't smell anything.
[Johnny leads them back into the dinner hall]
I smell something...
[looks at Johnny]
Bullshit!
Come here!
Hello baby. Did you miss me?

[Takes knife out]
Ooh, now look at this! This little baby brings back memories now, doesn't it?
What, you used it to knife your mother in the back?
Nah, but it put a big smile on your partner though. Ear
[motions the blade from one side of his face to the other]
wwsshh, to ear. Hehehe.
[Scorpion appears behind Johnny Cage]
Welcome!

[shouting]
You can't run from me, Shang!
I don't need to run!
You will be next!
I am the chosen one.
Some of you will even have the distinct honor and pleasure, to face Prince Goro, our reigning champion.

[to Goro]
See me, I belive in a fair fight. You know, one on one, man to man, hand to hand. Just like my daddy taught me. But what I saw up there was NOT very fair. Yeah Where was I... yeah. So then he freezes this guy, right? And then he explodes. I could see his guts and everything. Hmh, almost lost my lunch.
We're fighting for the fate of the world.
